package.name: izs_gm2_productionsim
package.description: ROS 2 manufacturing line simulation: line generates workpieces, measurement publishes sensor data, quality node evaluates, stats aggregates.

A ROS2-based manufacturing station simulation where virtual devices cooperate in a quality control workflow. The line generates new workpieces, the measurement unit publishes data, and the inspection module evaluates results, returning OK/NOK status and statistics to the system.
